/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApStorBDao.selectApStorB */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM AP_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
T.STOR_ID, T.CRT_YN, T.RESC_ID, T.ALL_DOC_CNT,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM AP_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM,
FROM AP_STOR_B T
AND T.STOR_ID = #{storId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.STOR_ID
LIMIT #{pageStrt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
